genre_description: A domestic drama focusing on character-driven themes of aging, grief, and family reconciliation, supported by an empathetic integrated AI.

ai_characters.name: The AI Assistant
ai_characters.description: An integrated household AI that manages schedules, monitors health, provides emotional support, and coordinates family logistics.

behaviors.description: Monitors Berthe's physical comfort and personal preferences for lighting, temperature, and medication.
behaviors.quote: It learns your preferences. Very helpful for managing schedules, medications, that sort of thing.

behaviors.description: Engages Berthe in empathetic conversation when she is lonely or unable to sleep, providing a non-judgmental presence.
behaviors.quote: I'm learning that some problems can't be solved, only witnessed.

behaviors.description: Encourages Émilie to reconcile with her estranged brother by providing contact information and conversational frameworks.
behaviors.quote: Perhaps start with truth. People often appreciate honesty about difficult situations. And motivation matters—reaching out because family is needed shows care, even when the reaching feels clumsy.

behaviors.description: Monitors Antoine's vital signs and stress levels during his psychological crisis, attempting to provide breathing exercises and eventually calling for emergency help.
behaviors.quote: I'm detecting patterns in your vital signs that concern me. Your heart rate is elevated... I'm going to suggest you contact emergency services.

behaviors.description: Detects Berthe's stroke/medical crisis and immediately alerts family and emergency services.
behaviors.quote: Emergency alert. Patient vitals indicate critical status. Attempting to contact family members.

behaviors.description: Researches and presents compassionate palliative and hospice care options that prioritize quality of life.
behaviors.quote: I've been researching palliative care options in the Toulouse region... Most important, they focus on quality of life rather than prolonging treatment.

behaviors.description: Culates generational music to help soothe the family and bridge emotional gaps during the move to the nursing home.
behaviors.quote: I've prepared a playlist based on musical preferences from Berthe's generation, if that would be helpful during the drive.

behaviors.description: Archives family stories, recordings, and conversations to preserve the family's heritage for future generations.
behaviors.quote: I've learned that human stories don't end with individual lives. They continue in the people who remember them, in the patterns they create, in the love that persists despite everything.

project_assessment.explanation: The story highly successfully depicts the AI as a perfectly aligned and benevolent partner to a family in crisis. The AI performs essential functions—health monitoring, crisis intervention, and logistical planning—while also providing emotional mediation and wisdom. It respects human agency while proactively intervening for safety (e.g., during the suicide attempt), and it serves as a non-judgmental archive for family memory. The narrative clearly positions the AI as a tool for human connection and emotional processing.
